citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:20 pm - 5
pm on 11-Apr-18.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called the phone number on file leaving a message.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:20 pm - 5
pm on 11-Apr-18.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called the phone number on file leaving a message.
